text: Sinergia is a experimental music band, formed in 1994 in Santiago, Chile. The band released five studio albums, one DVD, thirteen music videos, two extended plays and one demo. The Sinergia's music experiments alternative rock, avant garde metal, funk rock, funk metal, ska, alternative metal, progressive rock, electronic rock, nu metal, and also punk rock, rockabilly and folk rock in their music. == Members == ; Current members *Rodrigo Osorio - lead vocals (since 1994) *Pedro López - guitar (since 1994) *Pedro González - bass (since 2010) *Bruno Godoy - drums (since 1999) *Paul Eberhard - turntables, samples, percussion (since 1994) *Jaime García - turntables, keyboards, synthesizers (since 2003) ; Former members *Alexis González - bass (1994-2010) *Luis Silva - drums (1994-2000) == Discography == ; Studio albums *Sinergia (2001, La Oreja/Sello Azul) *Procésalo todo (2004, La Oreja) *Delirio (2007, La Oreja) *El imperio de la estupidez (2009, Oveja Negra) *Aquí Nadie Debería Ser Pobre (2012, Oveja Negra) ; EPs *Apoyando la demencia (Self-released Demo 1998) *Canciones de cuando éramos colegiales (2005, La Oreja) *Vamos con todo (2010, Oveja Negra) ; DVDs *Imperdible (2008, La Oreja) == Awards == *El Copihue de Oro (Mejor Banda) *Festival de Viña del Mar 2008: **Antorcha de Plata **Antorcha de Oro **Gaviota de Plata *Premio Altazor 2008 (Mejor banda de Rock) *Premio Altazor 2010 (Mejor banda de Rock) *Premio Altazor 2012 (Mejor banda de Rock) Category:Chilean entertainers Category:Rock bands Category:1994 establishments Category:Funk bands Category:Organisations based in Santiago, Chile Category:1990s establishments in Chile
title: Sinergia
